'''Radiant Spincrystal 79''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Hustle and Bustle of Ormos]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a crate on the north side of [[Acara Crafts]].
